DOC.brief_summary: To describe long-term persistence Hepatitis B pertussis antibody responses healthy 4- 5 Year old child previously vaccinate VAXELIS INFANRIX hexa
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Persistence Hepatitis B Pertussis Antibody Responses Healthy 4- 5 Year Old Children Previously Vaccinated With VAXELIS INFANRIX Hexa

Healthy child either gender , receive complete 3dose primary series complete 2 dose primary series follow toddler dose VAXELIS INFANRIX hexa part V419007 V419008 study respectively ; 2 .
